The location is excellent, only a few minutes walk from the City Hall MTR which is on the two main trainlines on the island (including the one to the airport). It is walking distance to many of the main attractions, unless there is monsoon-style rain happening!

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay on a Stopover”
Reviews.Author: sgd73
Reviews.Content: We stayed here as part of a Singapore stopover from AUS to Europe and were impressed by the efficiency and convenience of this hotel. The staff are friendly and check in/check out was smooth and quick. The hotel is conveniently located close to shops and the MRT and the public areas are clean, attractive and bright. The rooms/bathrooms are of a good size, which is fine for two/three nights, whilst the breakfast buffet is well stocked with good Eastern/Western offerings. A good business/stopover hotel, I can definitely recommend this hotel as a base to explore Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Our first stay in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: packingsuitcases
Reviews.Content: After reading previous reviews, we were not sure of our stay here. From the moment we arrived in Reception, our stay was wonderful. Staff were helpful, our room was great, facilities good, location good, nothing negative at all to report. Our room wasn't ready when we arrived at approx 8pm, we were given complimentary drinks & chips at the lounge bar while we waited, were told it would be 45 minutes, but in just 5 minutes we were given our key and told the room was ready. Rooms were not huge, but plenty big enough. Bathroom was a little small, but had everything necessary - usual toiletery items, etc; nice big fluffy towels; comfy king size bed, pillows were fine, curtains showed some sign of age, but perfectly adequate. Breakfast included was great, plenty of variety, attentive staff. Location was very handy to everything - we actually walked to Orchard Rd - took a while, but came back by cab, cost about $6. We only stayed two nights prior to our cruise on Superstar Virgo, but certainly would return to this hotel for future visits to Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: babbyf
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Grand Plaza Park Hotel for 2 nights and really enjoyed my stay. The staff are really courteous and the rooms are clean, although from my room there wasn't much of a view. As I had arranged for a taxi to meet me at 5am, the Concierge knew I was coming and addressed me by name as I came into the lobby which was unexpected but appreciated. The location is great, right in the middle of the city and close to the subway. I thoroughly recommend staying at the Grand Plaza.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: metallg
Reviews.Content: I spent 3 nights here on the way home to Australia from a European holiday. I chose the hotel largely on the basis of TripAdvisor reviews and because it is right in the middle of the city, close to train & bus routes, shops (mid-level & high-level) and cafes & food outlets- I was not disappointed. The front-of-house facilities & service were excellent, the cafe meals & breakfasts good and the room good. The gym & pool were excellent, better than most 3-4 star & some 5 star hotels I've stayed at. My only complaint is that housekeeping response to a request was slow, but the quality of their work was good.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: montymuffin
Reviews.Content: Spent 10 nights at this wonderful hotel and it surpassed all expectations . Had seen some reviews here which were a mixture of opinions so not sure what it would be like. We arrived very early in the morning so did not expect to have a room straight away . However we were able to get into our room by midday which was absolute bliss after a 14hr flight from the UK. The room was spacious and spotlessly clean as was the rest of the place. Extremely luxurious given the price . Breakfast from the buffet ranged from traditional English to local specialities with plenty to choose from . We were very well looked after by very attentive and friendly staff. All in all I can highly recommend the Grand Plaza on Coleman street

Reviews.Title: “First class location”
Reviews.Author: Hammers
Reviews.Content: Cannot believe this Hotel is rated only 18th in Trip-advisor, the other 17 must be absolutely fantastic. My wife and I stayed here for 4 nights on a stop over to Australia and thought this Hotel was fantastic. The rooms, restaurant, reception and pool area, were excellent; but above all the staff were friendly, helpful and very professional. If possible have the breakfast included when booking as this will set you up for either a days site-seeing or shopping, depending on your preference. Singapore can best be described as a Botanical Garden where people live and work. The whole island is spotlessly clean and perfectly safe of a night. The hotel is located very close to the river where restaurants are bars are not in short supply. We liked this Hotel and as our daughter now lives in Australia I am sure we will be making this our stop over destination again, hopefully very soon.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: antic
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel with my parents for four nights. I really liked this hotel. Great lobby and pool area. Very polite and professional staff. Rooms were clean, convenient and well decorated. Very good location.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: summerdaisy77
Reviews.Content: We love Singapore!!! We did a lot - Sentosa, Orchard Rd, Bugis, Night Safari, Clarke Quay, Night clubs, etc We are 2 fun nearly 30 girls from Perth WA. My friend and I had a 4 night stay in a twin room. We booked online. We loved the Grand Plaza Park. The hotel was lovely and well kept. Our rooms were very clean with very good facilities. The location was perfect. Close to everywhere via the MRT. It had a nice pool and a great gymnasium. We ate out so we cannot comment on the hotel food. We would definately stay at GPP again. The staff were very polite and check in easy.

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced”
Reviews.Author: flossieChristchurch
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 nights on our way to the UK. First impressions of the Hotel are excellent. It has a very lavish Reception area and the staff are very good . The rooms are tiny considering the price you have to pay, and the beds are like concrete. Fortunately there were many pillows, and to ensure I had a reasonable sleep, I actually slept on the pillows! The bathroom was OK, but looked somewhat tired. No special "touches" like orchids in the bathroom that we have previously had in cheaper hotels. We would not stay here again. You do not get good value for the price you pay.

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Park City Hall
HotelInfo.Address: 10 Coleman Street, Singapore 179809, Singapore (Formerly Grand Plaza Parkroyal)
